titleStmt.title: Observations upon the instructions for the taking the vovv and covenant throughout England.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the University,

notesStmt.note: Apparently a London counterfeit of the Oxford edition (Madan).

Includes an abridgment of "Instructions how and in what manner the said vow and covenant shall be taken" which were promulgated by Parliament 27 June 1643. "The said vow and covenant" is that promulgated by Parliament 6 June 1643.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
